```{r pancreas 32691338, include=FALSE}

PMID_32691338 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('32691338', database = 'PubMed')

citation_32691338 <- paste0(PMID_32691338$journal,' ', PMID_32691338$year, ' ', PMID_32691338$month,';', PMID_32691338$volume,'(', PMID_32691338$number,'):', PMID_32691338$pages)

PubMed_32691338 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_32691338$eprint)

doi_32691338 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_32691338$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
